product_name: Adventure Medical Kits After Bite Plus Itch Treatment with Antihistamine
long_description: Don't let bug bites stop you from enjoying your time outside. The Adventure Medical Kits After Bite Plus itch treatment cream uses antihistamine to offer soothing relief from itching and redness. Histamine blockers stops the itching and discomfort of bites and stings. Fast-acting cream absorbs easily into skin. .7 oz. container stores easily in a jacket or pants pocket.
short_description: Don't let bug bites stop you from enjoying your time outside. The Adventure Medical Kits After Bite Plus itch treatment cream uses antihistamine to offer soothing relief from itching and redness.
